title: How Do You Feel
lyrics:
Every day I sit with you talking about nothing
Watch the game and watch it for you your team
Laughs at all your jokes even when there not funny
Cause all I want to know is that you care
And he can’t seem to take his armor off

And he’s fighting against his own self

What do I do? What if I lose this game of tug of war?



All I want to know is how you feel when you’re with her

When she cracks a smile does it light up your world?

How do you feel when it’s all said and done?

Are you in love with her even though you can’t see?

How do you feel?

How do you feel?



I don’t need your name I don’t want your money

All I want to be is part of your dreams

I don’t need no extra all I want is love

Please open up and listen to me



And he can’t seem to take his armor off

And he’s fighting against his own self

What do I do? In this game of tug of war 



All (long) I want to know is how you feel when you’re with her

When she cracks a smile does it light up your world?

How do you feel when it’s all said and done?

Are you in love with her even though you can’t see?

How do you feel (Oh Ahhh) 



How do you feel? When you’re with her 

How you do feel? (Ahhh) (Uhhh Uahhh)

All I wanna know is how you feel when you’re with her 

When she cracks a smile does it light up your world?

How do you feel when it’s all said and done?

Are you in love with her even though you can’t see?

How do you feel (Oh Ahh) how do you feel?



(Oh Oh Oh My)





(Dank an warren für den Text)
